nodes.name: updateReputationRegistry

statements.operations:
{
    dataToSend := mload(0x40)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x4), 0xf58a1adb)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x24), _cost)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x44), _costProportion)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x64), _stakingPeriod)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x84), _proposer)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0xa4), _proposerType)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0xc4), _proposerStake)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0xe4), 0x120)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x104), _reputationRegistry)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x124), _tokenRegistry)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x144), 46)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x164), mload(add(_ipfsHash, 0x20)))
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x184), mload(add(_ipfsHash, 0x40)))
    mstore(dataToSend, 0x172)
    mstore(0x40, add(dataToSend, 0x192))
}

{
    dataToSend := mload(0x40)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x4), 0xae4d1af6)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x24), _hash)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x44), _tokenRegistry)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x64), _reputationRegistry)
    mstore(dataToSend, 0x64)
    mstore(0x40, add(dataToSend, 0x84))
}

statements.operations:
{
    dataToSend := mload(0x40)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x4), 0xf58a1adb)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x24), _cost)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x44), _costProportion)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x64), _stakingPeriod)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x84), _proposer)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0xa4), _proposerType)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0xc4), _proposerStake)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0xe4), 0x120)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x104), _reputationRegistry)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x124), _tokenRegistry)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x144), 46)
    mstore(add(dataToSend, 0x164), mload(add(_ipfsHash, 0x20)))

{

devdoc.author: Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley
devdoc.details: This contract must be initialized with the address of a valid Token Registry, Reputation Registry and Distribute Token

addTaskHash(address,bytes32).details: This library is imported into all the Registries to manage project interactions

checkActive(address).details: Used to create the correct msg.sender to manage control

checkEnd(address).details: Used to create the correct msg.sender to manage control

checkStaked(address).details: Used to create the correct msg.sender to manage control

checkValidate(address).details: Used to create the correct msg.sender to manage control

checkVoting(address).details: Used to create the correct msg.sender to manage control

params._claimer: Address of account to claim task.
params._index: Index of the task in task array.
params._weighting: Weighting of this particular task (proportion of project funds)

createProject(uint256,uint256,uint256,ad.details: Only callable by the ReputationRegistry or TokenRegistry, after proposer stake is confirmed.

params._cost: The total cost of the project in wei
params._costProportion: The proportion of the project cost divided by the DistributeToken weiBal represented as integer
params._ipfsHash: The ipfs hash of the full project description
params._proposer: The address of the user proposing the project
params._proposerStake: The amount of reputation or tokens needed to create the proposal
params._proposerType: Denotes if a proposer is using reputation or tokens, value must be 1: tokens or 2: reputation
params._stakingPeriod: The length of time this project is open for staking

freezeContract().details: Freezes the distribute token contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

params._plcrVoting: Address of the plcr voting contract
params._reputationRegistry: Address of the reputation registry contract
params._tokenRegistry: Address of the token registry contract

refundProposer(address,address).details: Only called by the TokenRegistry or ReputationRegistry
refundProposer(address,address).return: An array with the weiCost of the project and the proposers stake

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

submitHashList(address,bytes32[]).details: This function is an interation and requires variable gas.

params._index: Index of the task in task array

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unfreezeContract().details: Unfreezes the distribute token contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

updateDistributeToken(address).details: Update the address of the distributeToken

params._newDistributeToken: Address of the new distribute token

updatePLCRVoting(address).details: Instantiate a new instance of plcrVoting contract

params._newPlcrVoting: Address of the new plcr contract

updateProjectContract(address).details: Update the address of the base product proxy contract

params._newProjectContract: Address of the new project contract

updateReputationRegistry(address).details: Update the address of the reputation registry

params._newReputationRegistry: Address of the new reputation registry

updateTaskContract(address).details: Update the address of the base task proxy contract

params._newTaskContract: Address of the new task contract

updateTokenRegistry(address).details: Update the address of the token registry

params._newTokenRegistry: Address of the new token registry

devdoc.title: Project Registry for Distribute Network

addTaskHash(address,bytes32).notice: Submit a hash of a task list `_taskHash` to project at `_projectAddress` by staker `msg.sender`. Makes sure the Project is in the Active State, and calls stakedTaskHash.

checkActive(address).notice: Calls the project library checkActive function, passing along the topTaskHash of the project at `_projectAddress`

checkEnd(address).notice: Calls the project library checkEnd function. Burns tokens and reputation if the project fails

checkStaked(address).notice: Calls the project library checkStaked function

checkValidate(address).notice: Calls the project library checkValidate function

checkVoting(address).notice: Calls the project library checkVoting function

claimTask(address,uint256,bytes32,addres.notice: Claim a task at index `_index` from project at `_projectAddress` with description `_taskDescription`, weighting `_weighting` by claimer `_claimer. Set the ether reward of the task to `_weiVal` and the reputation needed to claim the task to `_reputationVal`

createProject(uint256,uint256,uint256,ad.notice: Create a project with a cost of `_cost`, a ratio of `_costProportion`, a staking period length of `_stakingPeriod`, by proposer `_proposer` of type `_proposerType` with stake of `_proposerStake` defined by ipfsHash `_ipfsHash`

init(address,address,address,address,add.notice: @dev Quasi constructor is called after thr project is deployed. Requires that all relevant contract address are not yet intialized.

refundProposer(address,address).notice: Refund a proposer if the project at `_projectAddress` is not in state: 1 Proposed or state: 8 Expired.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

rewardOriginator(address,address).notice: Sets the originator of a project plan to 0 after verifying msg.sender is the originator

submitHashList(address,bytes32[]).notice: Submit the final task list with hashed tasks `_hashes` for project at `_projectAddress`. Hashes the submitted task list to validate it is the top task hash list, and creates a task for each list item with the respective hash.

submitTaskComplete(address,uint256).notice: Mark that task at index `_index` in project at `_projectAddress` as completed by the claimer `msg.sender`

userdoc.notice: This project uses the Project Library to manage the state of Distribute Network projects.
